About me

Let me tell you something about myself

BIO

Electronics engineer with 2 years experience in programming in Python and C/C++. Besides experience in programming I can also design electronic circuits and printed circuit boards. I learn new technologies quickly and willingly, I can work in a team and I am not afraid of new challenges. I finished my master's degree in 2019 at the Wrocław University of Technology with excellent results and I was nominated for the competition of top 10 graduates. In my free time I like to develop my programming skills, but I also like rollerblading and traveling. since 2015 I am an active member of the MOS(microsystem oriented society) science club. During my activity in the science club I realized shows of the P.I.W.O. project and further developed the new system. Moreover, I was the leader of the Arcade Machine project and now I am the leader of the alarm/smart home project for the science club laboratory.

Thaumatec

Intern 2017.08 - 2017.10

My task was to develop API interface in Python language for LoRa network. During this internship I learned TDD approach, unit tests and use of PostgreSQL and MySQL databases.

Mate T

C/C++ developer 2017.11 - 2018.07

Vending machine software developement:

  • Graphical application (HMI) written in C++ using Qt5 libraries for Raspberry Pi CM3 platform (embedded linux, Raspbian, ARM)
  • Git projects maintenance
  • Building and maintenance of Docker container for cross-compiling apps for ARM target
  • CMake projects meintenance

Viessmann

Embedded software developer intern 2018.07 - present

My work at Viessmann was divided into two projects. One of them was the implementation of Industry 4.0 solutions in the Legnica factory, while the other was the implementation of internal IoT project in R&D office in Wrocław.

By Mateusz Janus
